sys_remote_update_set.description: Update set used to change notifications going to all ITX - Helpdesk and ITX - Desktop Support when a new task is assigned in general. Problem, Change and Catalog tasks will only notify those who are directly assigned to the task or those in other Interthinx groups or at other specified companies.
sys_remote_update_set.name: 2013-08-15 2013-08-15 ITX PRB, CHG, CAT Task Notif Update
